desc: Official Soul II Soul Clothing - The original Funki Dred's Steady are you ready? What's going on?

layout.text: AN AMALGAMATION OF MUSIC AND STYLE

As Jazzie himself puts it: "Soul II Soul has always been as much of a lifestyle statement as a musical movement. Our aim is to put some of that harmony into life with the philosophy of a happy face, a thumpin' bass for a lovin' race, and the clothing is coming from the same place as the music, allowing people to identify with these ideals 24/7. The new designs aim to recapture that spirit and make the same statements as before, in a time when we need that harmony more than ever." Soul II Soul clothing: for the way we live
